comet.domain package¶

Submodules¶

comet.domain.database module¶

comet.domain.domain module¶

The domain specifies the universe in which the bot’s policy acts.

A Domain subclass provides the actions the bot can take, the intents and entities it can recognise.

class comet.domain.domain.Domain(name, usr_act_set, system_act_set, system_unfeaturize_act_set=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

default_sys_acts = ['inform', 'request', 'ask_confirm', 'agree', 'deny', 'bye', 'cant_help', 'confirm_answer', 'handover', 'confirm_answer', 'offer']¶
default_unfeaturize_sys_acts = ['tag_question']¶
default_usr_acts = ['inform', 'request', 'ask_confirm', 'agree', 'deny', 'bye']¶

Load Domain from dictionary :type data: Dict :param data: domain dictionary :rtype: Domain :return: Domain

classmethod from_yaml(file_path)[source]¶

Load Domain from yaml file :type file_path: str :param file_path: the domain file with yaml format :return: Domain

Define the ontology, i.e. the general schema that dictates the dialogue as well as DB / KB.
